name: The Burden on our Back (Beta)
description:
The Burden on Our Back is a platformer that relies on and communicates Nahua knowledge and philosophy. Players navigate an abstract landscape attempting to track four Nahua figures who will provide additional skills and knowledge to help players along in the game. 

Press A and D to move. SPACE to jump. RETURN/ENTER to interact with objects. 

For best experience, play in FULLSCREEN
